name: Comeback Golf
description:
Comeback Golf! A fun, creative, retro golf game! Shape shots and add spin to pull off amazing shots!

Help JJ come back from injury to become the world number one again! Shape shots, choose the right spin, club and power to progress through the challenging single player story. 

Unlock 5 pretty hand crafted courses (with more to come) to perfect your stats in Stroke Play mode. Practice on the driving range. Beware of obstacles.... or use them to your advantage! 450yrd cart path drive anyone? Bounce on a boat to inch your shot closer!

Beat 5 unique opponents to win! Who is the mysterious 5th challenger?

There may be some Golf puns...

Future features may include multiplayer... more courses...and more furry animals... TBC
